search_query: Mac management software 2005 Apple enterprise deployment

competitors.name: Apple Server Admin Tools
competitors.notes: Apple's native server management tools included in OS X Server for basic Mac management capabilities

competitors.name: NetInstall (Apple Server)
competitors.notes: Apple's rudimentary image-management capabilities through NetInstall in Server app for OS X server

competitors.name: DeployStudio
competitors.notes: Free open-source tool for Mac deployment and imaging, filled gaps in Apple's native tools

competitors.name: Radmind
competitors.notes: Early Mac system administration tool suite for managing OS X deployments

context: Jamf Holding Corp. is a Apple device management company focused on Apple enterprise management, security, and identity. Founded for Mac management. Casper Suite for enterprises.
